text: sys(Question): Good day, how are you doing? usr: Not too well. I have been depessed because of our state shut down and today an old friend from unior high school passed. sys(Reflection of feelings, Question): Sorry to hear that. I absolutely understand, it's been hard on most people having to deal with the current state of affairs and losing people. Do you think things will improve? usr: Thank you. I know we are all in the same predicament. I think things will improve, but not for a year or more. sys(Self-disclosure, Question): I agree. I lost a teacher some time ago and I've been thinking a lot about when things might improve. A year seems plausible. Since it's so hard, are there things you think you can do to cheer yourself up? usr: A year is a long time when y A year is a long time when you are 76 years old. I just want to enjoy the rest of our lives - my husband and me - and travel until we can't enjoy it any longer. sys(Restatement or Paraphrasing, Self-disclosure): Sorry to hear that. It is really tough being restricted to not travelling. I call my parents (around your age) about once a week. usr: Thank you so much for your support. It is tough and there is nothing to do. sys(Question, Providing Suggestions): Do you have family you can talk to? Have you considered volunteering? I ask because my neighbor bakes for the local food bank and it helps her. usr: Yes, I do, but I can't talk to my son in Florida because he lost his job and havng tough time. I don't feel like I should enjoy my life when he is suffering. We may need to help him financially. I use to volunteer at a nursing home, but I am afraid to now with the virus sys(Affirmation and Reassurance, Providing Suggestions): That is reasonable. And it sounds like you are doing all you can. Could you teach from home online and keep yourself safe? Or perhaps provide your son financial support? usr: I am trying to do what I can for my son and also to help so I don't get too down and depressed. sys(Affirmation and Reassurance, Reflection of feelings): You are doing everything you can. Some things are just beyond our control. And we are all struggling, so please know you are not alone in your feelings. usr: Thank you - that makes me feel some better. You are right and I learned more than ever that some things I con't control. Yes, we are all struggling and trying to get this this pandemic. I am sorry that we are all going through this and pray it will get over soon.
label: ['Reflection of feelings']

text: usr: Hello sys(Question): Hello how are you doing today? usr: Somewhat stressed but otherwise ok. How about you? sys(Question): I am great, it snowed and looks like Christmas here. text: usr: Hello sys(Question): Hello how are you doing today? usr: Somewhat stressed but otherwise ok. How about you? sys(Question): I am great, it snowed and looks like Christmas here. Why are you so stressed? usr: I'm developing romantic feelings for a friend but she doesn't share those feelings with me in return. sys(Reflection of feelings, Question): That is very hard to have feelings for someone who does not feel the same way. We have been friends for a long time and I think it would be tough to smother these romantic feelings. sys(Question): Have you thought about talking with this friend about these feelings? usr: I have but I'm sure she wouldn't react very well and it could damage our relationship. I'm also pretty sure she's already aware. She's pretty sharp. sys(Providing Suggestions): Well maybe you should address these feelings with her in a very relaxed public atmosphere. Just let her know that you really like her and you have realized that she has many of the qualities that you look for in a person to get serious with. However, you treasure your friendship more than anything and you do not want anything to come in between your friendship....this way you have addressed your feelings, she knows how you feel and then should she decide to every take the friendship to the next step, she wouldn't feel awkward. usr: That sounds like a good plan. I do like having things out in the open instead of holding them in. My other thought was to maybe try to seek out a romantic partner that isn't her so then maybe the feelings would go to another focus and it wouldn't damage our relatinship.
label: ['Affirmation and Reassurance', 'Question']

text: sys(Question): Hello there, how are you feeling? usr: im good. how are you? just dealing with this guy sys(Restatement or Paraphrasing): So, you are having trouble dealing with someone? usr: yes and no. i agreed to work with him on the board when he asked me. he said he trusts me sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): If he says he trusts you I am sure that he does. He would not have asked you to work with him if he did not. usr: very true. not sure if he just likes me as as friend or if he wants me back. we dated then he broke up. then he asked me out again and didn't see me cuz he was busy. now he's asking me to be on the board with him. not sure if he has other motives to try to get back with me sys(Reflection of feelings): That must be incredibly confusing for you. How does this make you feel overall? usr: confused! i'll know sooner or later what he wants. thing is i was hanging out with his friends recently who had wanted to sleep with me. he knew it and didn't like it. he liked it when i stopped talking to them sys(Question): How does this relate to him asking you to be on the board with him? usr: cuz the first time he asked me out i was helping him with the board. i think it might be a way for him to spend time with me and then work his way back in. not sure if he will or not though. time will tell sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): It is okay to feel confused and perhaps even angry about this. Have you considered talking to him and asking him straight out what his intentions are? usr: yes but i'm afraid what i'll hear sys(Question): I realise that this must be difficult but isn't it best to get things out into the open? usr: it is but hes already hurt me before. i feel i'll find out sooner or later anyways. that way i can save face sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): I think it might be best for you to make a clean break. It sounds like you are being manipulated. usr: possibly. i'd prob be better being away from the situation sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): Certainly you would be. What sort of benefits do you feel that there are? usr: it gives me an upper edge and more clout sys(Question): In what way does it do that? usr: being on the board gives me perks sys(Question): Do you feel that perhaps you might be using him just a little bit? usr: yes and i think he is using me to a degree also sys(Reflection of feelings): Let me get this straight - you do have feelings for him but you are confused and you think that there's an element of mutual manipulation. usr: yes sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): You are definitely not the only person to feel this way! usr: it's a difficult situation. i think it will become clearer the deeper i get into it. thing is he is the head of the board and holds the power. what it comes down to is im wondering if he has feelings for me sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): I feel that you are paying too much attention to your position on the board. usr: i feel it gives me an advantage i want at the moment. sys(Reflection of feelings): But that is rather manipulative of you. usr: if you were me you would forget about him and the board sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): Yes I definitely would do that. usr: thing is he is encouraging me to be like that. cuz it helps him too okay. i'll try to lay low and walk away from it sys(Others): I think it's time for a clear severance. Do you have any other people you are interested in? text: usr: Hi I am so sad my boyfriend was cheating and broke up with me when I found out. I don't think I can ever be happy again. sys(Reflection of feelings): I am sorry to hear that. reading your opening statement it sounds like you are now suffering from low self-esteem is that true? usr: I have always had problems with low self esteem this makes it worse. I have lost interest in everything I can barely make myself go to work.
label: ['Question']

text: usr: Hi I am so sad my boyfriend was cheating and broke up with me when I found out. I don't think I can ever be happy again. sys(Reflection of feelings): I am sorry to hear that. reading your opening statement it sounds like you are now suffering from low self-esteem is that true? usr: I have always had problems with low self esteem this makes it worse. I have lost interest in everything I can barely make myself go to work. sys(Question): do you think if you knew the reasons why the relationship ended it would help you deal with things a lot better? usr: Maybe, why would he cheat? label: ['Others']

text: usr: Hi I am so sad my boyfriend was cheating and broke up with me when I found out. I don't think I can ever be happy again. sys(Reflection of feelings): I am sorry to hear that. reading your opening statement it sounds like you are now suffering from low self-esteem is that true? usr: I have always had problems with low self esteem this makes it worse. I have lost interest in everything I can barely make myself go to work. sys(Question): do you think if you knew the reasons why the relationship ended it would help you deal with things a lot better? usr: Maybe, why would he cheat? I have seen her she is not that pretty. I thought something was going on the last few months but he kept telling me everything was fine and that it was all my imagination. sys(Others): remember the fact that he cheated is not your fault. if he entered into a committed relationship with you you should not be cheating. if things aren't right you should be talking this through with you before deciding to move on and see someone else. usr: I thought I was a good girlfriend, I was loyal, nice to his friends, kept the house nice, cooked for him, he never said he was unhappy he just started having to work nights and weekends a lot with no overtime he said he was salary now. I must just be unlovable.
label: ['Providing Suggestions']

text: usr: Hi I am so sad my boyfriend was cheating and broke up with me when I found out. I don't think I can ever be happy again. sys(Reflection of feelings): I am sorry to hear that. reading your opening statement it sounds like you are now suffering from low self-esteem is that true? usr: I have always had problems with low self esteem this makes it worse. I have lost interest in everything I can barely make myself go to work. sys(Question): do you think if you knew the reasons why the relationship ended it would help you deal with things a lot better? usr: Maybe, why would he cheat? I have seen her she is not that pretty. I thought something was going on the last few months but he kept telling me everything was fine and that it was all my imagination. sys(Others): remember the fact that he cheated is not your fault. if he entered into a committed relationship with you you should not be cheating. if things aren't right you should be talking this through with you before deciding to move on and see someone else. usr: I thought I was a good girlfriend, I was loyal, nice to his friends, kept the house nice, cooked for him, he never said he was unhappy he just started having to work nights and weekends a lot with no overtime he said he was salary now. I must just be unlovable. sys(Providing Suggestions): have you tried getting back out there and dating again? just because he didn't want to have an honest relationship with you, doesn't mean that nobody else does. also in my message above I have made a couple of autocorrect errors, apologies for that. usr: I trusted what he told me despite my gut feeling which turned out to be right. I thought we were so perfect together, I don't want him back I could never trust him again, I am not sure I could trust any guy right now, I am so hurt and confused. I don't ever want to feel like this again. sys(Information): relationship issues, especially when they and suddenly can be one of the most stressful periods in an adults life. you are not alone in that other people have been through similar experiences themselves usr: This was the first guy I ever lived with, I thought we would get married one day. How do people make it through the pain, it actually hurts. sys(Providing Suggestions): Do you have someone who you can talk to about this to support you? usr: I have a couple acquaintances at work but I wouldn't want to discuss my personal life with, my mom said to have a good cry but I almost couldn't stop once I started. He was my best friend and who I talked to once we got together I didn't seem to need anyone else which looks like a mistake now. That is why I am here for support.
label: ['Providing Suggestions']

I am able to pull up zoom on my laptop, but it is almost more cumbersome because I must switch back and forth. I have to also manipulate an excel as well as watch the instructor. My colleagues in the class are annoying, because they do not know how to use mute correctly. sys(Providing Suggestions): Do you have access to a second screen or have the ability to stream the class on your tv through chromecast or something? usr: I don't have a second screen, but I do have a large TV. I may be able to hook it up via HDMI.
label: ['Affirmation and Reassurance', 'Providing Suggestions']

text: usr: Good evening sys(Question): Hi, how's things? usr: Things are ok I am just having issues with the problem above sys(Question): I am afraid that I am not able to see that .. can you tell me about it? usr: Yes, so I have always done very well in school and university. Have you looked on the internet such as indeed? usr: I've tried LinkedIn they have many companies hiring maybe my CV is just bad sys(Others, Others): yes they do i am familiar with that how is your resume looking? usr: I think I could improve it sys(Providing Suggestions): Have you talked to someone in your family and see if they could help you with your resume to improve it usr: I've asked some friends, I think a friend will help me out when he's not busy sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): do not let this bring you down i know you will find a job soon it will just take time and you have to just be patient usr: Yes I know sys(Providing Suggestions): have you tried to go to place and talk to a hiring boss about a job? usr: It's hard with this virus to go anywhere pretty much sys(Reflection of feelings): yes i can understand that. usr: Worst time to graduate Haven't even got the graduation ceremony lol sys(Affirmation and Reassurance, Others): all you can honestly really do right now is to try to improve your resume and see if that helps any and just keep searching for jobs and putting in applications and i know you will get a call from a job soon yes it has been a bad year for anything to happen usr: Yea that's what I am thinking of doing sys(Others): good thing is you graduated and congrats on that usr: yes at least I graduated haha thank you sys(Information): your welcome hope my suggestions helped you today usr: thanks a lot (15min is minimum ) you made my mood go up sys(Others): i am glad i could help you usr: Have a great evening and thanks for suggestions :)
label: ['Others']

text: usr: Hello sys(Question): hello, how are you doing and how was your night? usr: It's been tough. I've been looking for a job for months, but feel like I'm getting nowhere.
label: ['Restatement or Paraphrasing']

text: usr: Hello sys(Question): hello, how are you doing and how was your night? usr: It's been tough. I've been looking for a job for months, but feel like I'm getting nowhere. sys(Restatement or Paraphrasing): I'm sorry to hear that but if i may hear your you clearly, what you are saying is that you don't have any job for a long time now usr: Well, I am fortunate to have a job, but I am seeking a different job because the one I have does not pay what my skills are worth. It barely pays enough for me to pay my essential bills.

I know half the core staff I would be working with daily and think of them as extended family. sys(Providing Suggestions): you just have to be patient and don't push it too hard so that you won't look desperate usr: The benefits are nice, also, such as staff are provided meals prepared by the banquet chef and his team when at work. And though everyone has a role, the office staff support each other well and work as a team. sys(Restatement or Paraphrasing): wow, banquet at work. that is a wonderland stuff usr: At the risk of preaching religion, I believe God may be calling me to serve there. sys(Affirmation and Reassurance, Affirmation and Reassurance): that is definitely a dream job. God is everywhere just put your trust in Him. He never sleep nor slumber usr: When off duty, staff are encouraged to enjoy the facilities and mingle with guests. There is an Olympic sized pool, field games, a gymnasium, an exercise room, and if off duty, one can attend most any of the events on the campus, unless designated as a private event. sys(Restatement or Paraphrasing): wow! Olympic size pool. Keep praying. the job is yours. usr: Because my job is to sell repeat business, it is essential that I get out and meet guests and make certain that their needs are met, but it usually comes in the form of serving snacks at intermission and saying hellos as one passes. It would feel like a family reunion, but in a family where everyone gets along. sys(Reflection of feelings): that is good, i work in such place where everyone is like a family. usr: The music events year round are outstanding. They have many well known names in Christian music as well as speakers who are well worth hearing. To be able to hear these messages at no cost makes the job priceless. sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): i can feel your excitement. usr: As I said to my pastor, just to work somewhere where people say thank you and ask how you are doing rather than criticize every move would be such a blessing. And since I work nights already, I am more than happy to cover the office overnight to attend to guests who have locked themselves out, or have other concerns. I used to live on site at the motel where I work now, and on my days off, all I did was make keys and walk the grounds to ensure safety. At this facility, there are beautiful benches to sit and watch the moon and stars and enjoy the sunrise or just take a moment. There are covered gazebos and a couple buildings have deep covered porches for days when it's a bit rainy or the sun is strong. And we're across the street from mountains and a river. The campus is simply beautiful.
label: ['Providing Suggestions']

But I think its important to remember the bigger picture that peoples lives are literally at stake and the people that disregard need to be more aware. usr: We feel like after this is all over, they will still remind us that we were standoffish during this time. text: usr: hi there sys(Others): Hello, how are you? usr: I'm surviving. Today is better than yesterday was. sys(Affirmation and Reassurance, Question): That's good. What is bothering you? usr: I've been out of work since Covid closed down the live event industry in March. the unemployment system still hasn't processed any of my claims, and I have been surviving off of what I can make driving for doordash, which hasn't been a lot.
label: ['Affirmation and Reassurance']

text: sys(Others): Hello usr: Hello, how are you doing today? sys(Others): I am good how are you usr: I am glad you are doing well, I have been struggling lately as my girlfriend that I was going to propose to broke up with me. She told me that my career path was different then hers and she just did not see it working out.
label: ['Question', 'Reflection of feelings']

text: sys(Others): Hello usr: Hello, how are you doing today? sys(Others): I am good how are you usr: I am glad you are doing well, I have been struggling lately as my girlfriend that I was going to propose to broke up with me. She told me that my career path was different then hers and she just did not see it working out. sys(Question, Reflection of feelings): How was your career path different? I understand how you are feeling everything will be okay usr: She had a desire to do marine biology and I wanted to pursue law enforcement as a police officer, however due to my back injury that fell through recently. She would spend most of her time doing field work, which would require her to spend time out at sea. She was working in a nursing home at the time and was not a marine biologist.
label: ['Information']

I am unsure what to think, but she did say that she just didn't see how our career paths would work out and that was that.

text: usr: My boyfriend broke up with me. sys(Question): Hello there, how are you? usr: I'm very upset. text: sys(Others): Hello usr: Hello. I need some help. I have been depressed.
label: ['Others', 'Question']

text: sys(Others): Hello usr: Hello. I need some help. I have been depressed. sys(Others, Question): How are you doing today? Do have anything on your mind? Oh i see, well we can talk about that if you like. Has anything happened recently to make you feel this way? usr: I am not doing very well. Very depressed with having to stay home because of the COVID-19/ I will appreciate anything you can do to help me.
label: ['Restatement or Paraphrasing']

text: sys(Others): Hello usr: Hello. I need some help. I have been depressed. sys(Others, Question): How are you doing today? Do have anything on your mind? Oh i see, well we can talk about that if you like. Has anything happened recently to make you feel this way? usr: I am not doing very well. Very depressed with having to stay home because of the COVID-19/ I will appreciate anything you can do to help me. sys(Restatement or Paraphrasing): It sounds like social isolation is really weighing on you... usr: Yes, it sure is. I feel so alone. I feel it will help to talk to an outsider.
label: ['Affirmation and Reassurance']

text: usr: Good afternoon/evening sys(Question): Hello, how are you tonight? usr: Doing great. How about yourself?
label: ['Question']

text: usr: Good afternoon/evening sys(Question): Hello, how are you tonight? usr: Doing great. How about yourself? sys(Question): I'm doing well how can I help you tonight? usr: So, the issue I'm having is work-related. My son had heart surgery a few months ago. He now has a pacemaker. He's also in the middle of testing for CP. My job requires that I be around a lot of people. I always wear a mask...but sometimes the people I am with do not. Nor do they respect the 6-foot boundary. A simple cold gives my son a fever of 103. Im scared that if I continue to work, Im putting him in danger. But if I stop, I can no longer afford bills. My son just turned 2.
label: ['Affirmation and Reassurance']

text: usr: Good afternoon/evening sys(Question): Hello, how are you tonight? usr: Doing great. How about yourself? sys(Question): I'm doing well how can I help you tonight? usr: So, the issue I'm having is work-related. My son had heart surgery a few months ago. He now has a pacemaker. He's also in the middle of testing for CP. My job requires that I be around a lot of people. I always wear a mask...but sometimes the people I am with do not. Nor do they respect the 6-foot boundary. A simple cold gives my son a fever of 103. Im scared that if I continue to work, Im putting him in danger. But if I stop, I can no longer afford bills. My son just turned 2. sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): I can see where this would be frustrating. As parents our biggest goal is to keep them safe and healthy. Have you thought about having a conversation with the people you are around to inform them you'd wish they wear a mask? usr: I have. A few people respected my wishes. But one in particular stands out. A gentleman who told me he had a medical condition and proceeded to get in my face. He got angry at my request. In my shoes, what would you do? Because I feel like Im stuck between a rock and a hard place lol
label: ['Reflection of feelings']

text: sys(Question): hello, how are you feeling today? usr: I am feeling really sad and lonely right now. My boyfriend and I broke up and it was me who wanted it but now I regret breaking up and he doesn't want me back. sys(Affirmation and Reassurance): I am sorry to hear that, I can understand when we think we want something and then we change our mind but it's too late. usr: That is exactly it. I broke up with him because I liked another person but then quickly realized that I made a mistake and it's too late. I want him back should I start calling and going to his house to beg? sys(Question): nobody knows him better than you do, right now I do not think he is in a good place either since it wasn't his choice to end it, how do you think he would react if you started pressuring him? usr: I haven't really thought of that yet. He has a pretty short temper actually. I know he is really mad at me so I think he might want to yell at me and get his anger out before he could start being nice to me again. sys(Providing Suggestions): frustration and anger are common responses in situations like this, perhaps you can try a softer approach and let him know how you feel, without pressuring him into a response usr: Yeah, that's true. I have been secretly watching his social media and he has girls asking him out and I don't want to let them get to him before I can get him back. I want to make it up to him somehow and do whatever he wants to get back together. sys(Question): you can always ask him calmly if he would like to talk, so you both have a chance to express your feelings in a safe way, with no yelling or arguing, do you think that's something he would do? usr: I can try that, I think he might be responsive at first if I dont set him off. All of his friends hate me so I have nobody on my side right now. Should I try to get his friends to like me again? Is that an way I could use to get him to want me again? sys(Reflection of feelings): nobody likes to see that one's friend is sad because of someone else, I think this is an issue that only the two of you can resolve, if he takes you back then his friends will take you back as well, but you need to make sure you want him back usr: I can understand what you mean. I need to think this through. sys(Information): what made you like someone else in the first place? usr: Well, we are in a small town and he was popular and the cutest guy in our town. I liked being with someone so popular. He wasn't always nice to me and is why I wanted to be with someone else for a short time. He used to leave me at parties and go off with his friends sometimes. sys(Question): was it a common thing that he didn't give you the attention you wanted? usr: My friends always said that I could do better and that he didn't deserve me. He gave me statis in our town and everyone wanted to be his girlfriend so I think I liked the attention, yes. sys(Reflection of feelings): were you happy with him or were you happy that you were with the popular guy? usr: I really liked being with the popular guy who everyone looked up to. My parents don't like him at all and have wanted us to break up the whole time we were together. sys(Reflection of feelings): it sounds to me like you liked the title more than the feeling of being with him, reflecting on your time together, would you do that again? usr: I have never thought of it this way. You are making a lot of good points that I never thought of before. When I think about him I miss the way I felt in terms of being popular. I don't really miss him as a person.
label: ['Providing Suggestions']
